top_comments.comment: So many good DIY projects 👏♥ I really liked the mason jars and napkins holder!

I loved all of these! The paper wreath in a slightly larger scale would also make a great advent calendar. Just punch a hole in the top of the round part and the flappy top part of each cone, feed some thread through the holes, fill the cone with a piece of candy and tie the thread. Then write the numbers on the closed "lids" with a marker.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
My favorite was the French horn
🎺🌿🎼
All of the projects came out awesome!!!
So many good DIY projects 👏♥ I really liked the mason jars and napkins holder!
French horn is my favorite too. I made one of those many years ago as a gift.

I think the sheet music wreath and sweater projects were my favorites.  I’m SO glad you didn’t paint that beautiful wooden bowl!  😃 It drives me crazy when crafters paint over beautiful, natural wood!
